bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: List of Walter Reed's books, offered for sale by Blossom Reed, [19--]

div1.p: This document lists books, formerly owned by Walter Reed, which Blossom Reed is attempting to sell.

div1.head: List of Walter Reed's books, offered for sale by Blossom Reed, [19--]

list.head: INTERNATIONAL SCIENTIFIC SERIES - 5 volumes
list.item:
1. Mind and Body, by Alexander Bain, L.L.D., D. Appleton & Co., 549-551 Broadway,
New York, 1874
Inscription: Walter Reed, Brooklyn, January 1874.

2. The Study of Sociology, by Herbert Spencer, D. Appleton & Co., 549-551 Broad-
way, New York, 1874,
Inscription: Walter Reed, Brooklyn, Jan. 1874.

3. The Conservation of Energy, by Balfour Stewart, L.L.D., F.R.S.
(with an appendix, Treating of the vital and mental applications of
the doctrine), D. Appleton & Co., 549-551 Broadway, New York, 1874.
Inscription: Walter Reed, M.D., 115 Lee Avenue, Brooklyn.

4. The New Chemistry, by Josiah P. Cooke, Jr., D. Appleton & Co., 549 & 551
Broadway, New York, 1874
Inscription: Walter Reed, M.D., Brooklyn, N.Y., April 3rd, 1874

5. The Forms of Water in Clouds & Rivers, Ice & Glaciers, by John Tyndall, LL.D.,
F.R.S., New York, D. Appleton & Co., 549 & 551 Broadway, 1872
No inscription.

6. The Professor at the Breakfast-table, with the Story of Iris, by Oliver
Wendell Holmes, Ticknor and Fields, Boston, 1860
Inscription: Walter Reed, M.D., Brooklyn, 1875.

7. Color Blindness, Its Dangers And Its Detection, by B. Joy Jeffries, A.M.,
M.D., Houghton, Osgood and Company, Boston, The Riverside Press,
Cambridge, 1879
Inscription: Walter Reed, U.S.A., July 17, 1880

8. Salad for the Social,
DeWitt & Davenport, 160-162 Nassau Street, New York, 1856
Inscription: W. Reed, Presented by J. H. Raymond, M.D.
